Sharḥ Khulāṣat al-ḥisāb
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Khalkhālī, ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī , active 1600

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Black cloth; tan leather spine and corners.
Written in one column, 13 lines per page, in black and red.
According to the colophon (f. 199r), copy completed in the hand of Khwājah Munawwar ʻAlī in Hyderabad on 25 Jumādá al-Ūlá 1256 AH [March 11, 1840 AD].
MS Arab SM4286. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
